TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PropertyDataTypeCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable
Public NotInheritable Class PropertyDataTypeCollection Implements ICollection
public ref class PropertyDataTypeCollection sealed : System::Collections::ICollection

remarks.para: The PropertyDataTypeCollection object is within the site context and stores supported property data types in the user profile database for a specific site.

example.para: The following code example shows the use of the class.
